recipe.ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened almond milk,1/2 cup Greek yogurt (low-fat, no added sugar),3/4 cup frozen blueberries,1 tablespoon almond butter,1 tablespoon chia seeds,1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract,2 teaspoons erythritol or stevia to taste (optional),Ice cubes (as needed)
recipe.directions: In a blender, combine the almond milk, Greek yogurt, frozen blueberries, almond butter, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and your choice of erythritol or stevia if additional sweetness is desired.,Blend on high until the mixture is smooth. Add ice cubes until you reach the desired consistency.,Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy immediately.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 280,Total fat 15g,Saturated fat 1g,Trans fat 0g,Monounsaturated fat 3g,Cholesterol 7mg,Sodium 180mg,Total carbohydrate 23g,Dietary fiber 7g,Total sugars 11g (includes 0g added sugars),Protein 17g
